images.title: Image Copyright & Fair Use Guide
images.description: Understand the basics of image copyright, fair use factors, and the difference between royalty-free and rights-managed images.
images.altText: Infographic explaining image copyright, public domain, creative commons, and fair use

images.title: Optimizing Images for Web Performance
images.description: Learn how to speed up your website by choosing the right file formats, compression techniques, and lazy loading strategies.
images.altText: Infographic showing tips for image optimization, formats, and cdn usage

images.title: Reverse Image Search Mastery
images.description: Master the art of reverse image search using Google, TinEye, Bing, and Yandex to find image sources and higher resolutions.
images.altText: Infographic comparison of reverse image search tools including Google, TinEye, and Bing

images.title: 2025 Social Media Image Sizes Guide
images.description: Always use the correct image dimensions for major social platforms including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
images.altText: Infographic displaying correct image dimensions for major social media platforms

images.title: Image File Formats Explained: JPEG, PNG, WEBP, SVG
images.description: A clear comparison of common image file formats. Know when to use JPEG, PNG, WEBP, or SVG for your web projects.
images.altText: Infographic comparing pros and cons of JPEG, PNG, WEBP, and SVG formats

images.title: Alt Text Best Practices for SEO & Accessibility
images.description: A visual guide to writing perfect alt text. Learn do's and don'ts to improve your website's accessibility and image SEO ranking.
images.altText: Infographic illustrating best practices for writing image alt text

images.title: Image Sitemaps Explained
images.description: Understand how image sitemaps help search engines discover and index your images, boosting your visibility in Google Image Search.
images.altText: Infographic showing the structure and benefits of image sitemaps

images.title: Lossy vs. Lossless Image Compression
images.description: Compare lossy and lossless compression methods. Deciding between smaller file sizes (JPEG) and higher quality (PNG) for your needs.
images.altText: Infographic comparing lossy and lossless image compression techniques

images.title: Favicon Design Essentials
images.description: Tips for creating effective favicons. Cover simplicity, contrast, sizes, and formats to ensure your brand looks great in browser tabs.
images.altText: Infographic with design tips for creating effective favicons

images.title: Why Use an Image CDN?
images.description: Explore the benefits of using a Content Delivery Network for images, including faster load times, reliability, and global reach.
images.altText: Infographic explaining the benefits of using an image CDN
